name: Today'sKingJamesVersion
0:
”Alexa, open Today's King James Version”
”Alexa, tell Today's King James Version to read John 3.”
”Alexa, tell Today's King James Version to read today's chapter.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: today's king james version
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now it is easy to learn about the greatest book on earth (the Bible). Just sit back and listen. Alexa brings the Bible alive.

What would the KJV be like if its translators could use today's technology and today's words? The answer is Today's King James Version (taken from the Breakthrough KJV). It was translated from the Textus Receptus (the Greek text closest to the King James Version) in today's words with the help of today's advanced tools to produce a high definition Bible that is easy-to-understand.

Even if you never go to church, you won't have a problem understanding this Bible.

This High Definition Bible in today's everyday words is much more accurate to the Greek text than the low resolution Bibles of yesteryear.

Start with John 1 (just say, "Start" after Today's King James Version starts). When Alexa is finished with it, say Next, and she will go to the next chapter. You can go all the way through the New Testament like this.

Today's King James Version also features a daily chapter from the Bible (just say Daily).

Discover God's message and instructions for you from the comfort of your home.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
